title: 23rd Division (Yugoslav Partisans)
text: The 23rd Serbia Division (<a href="Serbo-Croatian">Serbo-Croatian</a> <a href="Latin%20script">Latin</a>: "Dvadesettreća srpska divizija") was a <a href="Yugoslav%20Partisans">Yugoslav Partisan</a> <a href="Division%20%28military%29">division</a> formed on 6 June 1944 as the 3rd Serbia Division in <a href="Toplica%20District">Toplica</a>. It was formed from the 7th and 9th Serbia Brigades. On 17th June 1944, the 14th Serbia Brigade was added to the division which at the time numbered around 2,000 soldiers. The division was under the direct command of the <a href="Supreme%20Headquarters%20%28Yugoslav%20Partisans%29">Supreme Headquarters</a> until 6 September 1944 when it became part of the <a href="14th%20Corps%20%28Yugoslav%20Partisans%29">14th Corps</a>. On 9 December 1944, it came under the command of the Southern Operational Group and in January 1945 it became part of the <a href="2nd%20Army%20%28Yugoslav%20Partisans%29">2nd Army</a>.
